Scripts (artview.scripts)Â¶

ARTview offer some function to start programs using basic configurations.

compare_fields([DirIn, filename, field]) artview execution for comparing fields in radar display
corrections([DirIn, filename, field]) artview execution for radar corrections
edit_radar([DirIn, filename, field]) artview execution for filtering gates radar display
gatefilter([DirIn, filename, field]) artview execution for filtering gates radar display
grid([DirIn, filename, field]) artview execution for simple grid display
manual_unfold([DirIn, filename, field]) artview execution for manual unfolding velocity field of radar
map_to_grid([DirIn, filename, field]) artview execution for mapping radar data to grid
radar([DirIn, filename, field]) artview execution for simple radar display
radar_and_grid([DirIn, filename, field]) artview execution for radar and grid display
select_region([DirIn, filename, field]) artview execution for selecting a region in radar display
standard([DirIn, filename, field]) standard artview execution
view([DirIn, filename, field]) artview execution for advanced IO display
